meaningMnemonic: They <kanji>warn</kanji> you and they <kanji>guess</kanji> when you've done something wrong (with evidence, of course!). They are the <vocabulary>police</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
